description:
A chocobo is an adventurer's best friend!

With the new Buddy System, you can take a chocobo buddy with you on your adventure. 
Invite Ninja and begin your journey now!

[Ability]
Fuma Shuriken：Hurl a massive shuriken to deal huge damage to a foe up to 3 tiles ahead of you and knock them back.aming with draconic fury to pierce all foes in 3 directions ahead of you, up to 2 tiles away.
name: Buddy Chocobo “Ninja”
